raw akas.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio
A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio

akas: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (original title)
A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio Brazil (alternative title)
The Amazing Professor Ambrosius' Mansion (new title)
akas from release info: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (original title)
A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio Brazil (alternative title)
The Amazing Professor Ambrosius' Mansion (new title)

55.title: O Barão Funesto

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

55.plot: Baron Funesto is on his decrepit and abandoned mansion when he sees on the news that his old classmate, Professor Ambrosio, received another prize for his geniality.

56.title: Asas pra que te quero?

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

56.plot: Professor Ambrosio decides to go for a fly on 14 BIS along with Santos Dumont. During their ride they have their sight impaired by a strange black smoke.

57.title: A Volta do Conde Drácula

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

57.plot: The dreadful Count Dracula haunts the Mansion with his pointy tusks. Professor is in danger as he doesn't know that his guest Count Vlad Tepes is actually Count Dracula.

58.title: Leonardo e Napoleão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

58.plot: Napoleon Bonaparte has a Machiavellian plan for his army to be invincible: using a war machine that will have no mercy for the enemies.

59.title: Há Algo de Podre no Reino da Dinamarca

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

59.plot: Claudinha is rehearsing a play and it's not being that easy for her. Leslie, a great actor, helps her. What they don't notice is that someone is watching them.

60.title: Rumo à Terra do Nunca

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

60.plot: Claudinha is visited by Peter Pan. The boy is annoyed, because he had its shadow stolen by Captain Hook, who allied itself to another famous villain of the Mansion: Billy Caolho.

61.title: 1, 2, 3 Gengis Kahn!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

61.plot: Junior, Claudinha and Leslie are playing hide-and- seek, when all of a sudden the fearful Genghis Khan starts playing with them.

62.title: Jovens para Sempre

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

62.plot: The great explorer Ponce de León invites Professor and his gang to an expedition to search for the legendary Fountain of Youth.

63.title: Que Medo!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

63.plot: On a mysterious and rainy evening on the Haunted Mansion, Ambrosio loses his glasses and has an unexpected visitor. As he can't see a thing, he doesn't realize that his visitor is Frankenstein Monster, created by the writer Mary Shelley.

64.title: Capitão Nemo e Moby Dick

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

64.plot: Professor is in his mansion when he gets a message in Morse Code from the famous Captain Nemo, that was prisoned by baron Funesto in his own watercraft, Nautilus.

65.title: Gênio da Mansão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

65.plot: While he's tidying up the Mansion's attic, Junior finds a beautiful golden piece.

66.title: Meia Noite em Paris

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

66.plot: Paris. The city of lights. Professor is asked on a quest to find out who stole the bells from famous Notre-Dame Cathedral.

67.title: Leslie, O Pensador!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

67.plot: Rodin, the famous French artist, portrays the little mouse Leslie on several statues that are for sale on the Mansion's garden, in order to get money for charity. That calls the eye of a statue lover and old Professor's friend: Medusa.

68.title: O Vôo do Zepelin

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

68.plot: Professor has a guest, the honorable Ferdinand Von Zeppelin, Zeppelin's inventor. Together they go for a ride on his invent.

69.title: Os Muitos Trabalhos de Hércules

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

69.plot: The Baron of Coubertin, creator of the modern Olympic games, goes to the mansion to visit his old friend, Professor Ambrosius.

70.title: Trabalhando Forçado

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

70.plot: Professor and his nephews are sunbathing in the garden when a carriage carrying Abraham Lincoln and Princess Isabel arrives with bad news.

71.title: Os 3 Mosqueteiros

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

71.plot: Junior and Claudinha play fencing and Leslie and Floribela are cheering when Funesto arrives and challenges the Professor to an old-fashioned sword fight.

72.title: Quem Roubou a Minha Pirâmide?

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

72.plot: The Great Queen Cleopatra asks for Professor Ambrosius help to solve a mystery in the ancient Egypt.

73.title: Entrando pelo Cano

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

73.plot: Noticing that the mansion is empty Funesto ceases the opportunity to invade it and take it for himself.

74.title: A Primeira Viagem de Gulliver

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

74.plot: The Professor sleeps peacefully, without realize that he's being taken by a group of miniature people. The small residents of the fantastic Lilliput have captured Ambrosius and Gulliver.

75.title: Excalibur

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

75.plot: Looking for something to replace his broken wooden sword Junior stumbles upon the legendary Excalibur, the sword of King Arthur. But not only Junior is delighted with her.

76.title: Sonhos num Acampamento de Verão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

76.plot: It is vacation time in the mansion, and the Professor's nephews are ready to camp in the gardens. The processor sets up a tent and a nice bonfire and tell mythic stories while they eat marshmallows.

77.title: Uma Aventura Jurassica

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

77.plot: The professor creates a new device capable of time travel. Excited, Junior take the device from the hands of the Professor and without learning how to use it send all the team back to the Jurassic era.

78.title: Os Fantasmas se Divertem

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

78.plot: Ghosts are invading the mansion leaving everyone frighten and ready to break and run. Worried about the situation the Professor ask the famous Sherlock Holmes for help.

79.title: Evolução em Teoria

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

79.plot: The Professor, his assistants and his nephews are playing in the courtyard when the famous boat "BEAGLE", from Charles Darwin, emerges from the mansion's fountain to take them to the Galapagos Islands.

80.title: Joana e o Dragão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

80.plot: The Professor is at ease in his home when a terrible roar scares him to death. A dragon wanders around his mansion, commanded by his arch-rival, Baron Funesto.

1.title: A Roda

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

1.plot: While Leslie is having fun and teasing Floribela at the same time with a small remote control car, the professor tells about the invention of the Wheel, in the ancient Mesopotamia.

2.title: Vampiros

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

2.plot: During a stormy and sinister night, the professor is surprised by a mysterious visitor while he talks to children about the myth of the vampires.

3.title: A Invenção do Macarrão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

3.plot: The Professor goes to the kitchen and finds a Chinese cook close to an Italian cook. Both are preparing a very traditional dish: pasta. But who invented it? So a great confusion begins.

4.title: A Eletricidade e a Lâmpada Elétrica

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

4.plot: The professor is in his room when light goes off. Thunderstorms resound over the house and he decides to see what is happening. When he is outside, he meets a man wearing a white wig and dressing old fashioned clothes, flying a kite with a key. It's Benjamin Franklin. Close to him it's Thomas Edison holding a lamp. Let the light begin.

5.title: A Lei da Gravidade

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

5.plot: Claudinha and Junior go to the Mansion to spend the weekend. They arrive in the middle of an experiment that Ambrosius and Leslie are doing concerning the Law of gravity.

6.title: A Magia da Música

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

6.plot: The mansion is transformed in an "American Idol" show contest, where Claudinha and Junior will perform a final match. And the jury is no more, no less than Beethoven and Mozart, two of the greatest occidental musicians ever.

7.title: A Escrita e o Alfabeto

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

7.plot: Leslie is having fun with your remote control car at the mansion's garden when he faces some old stones with lots of ancient writings. The professor tells him about the origin of the writings and how they evolved into the first alphabets.

8.title: O Telefone

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

8.plot: Time to eat. So the professor decides to order a pizza. But Graham Bell, the creator of the telephone, shows up and gets wondered by the evolution of the device he created. Ding.

9.title: Animais em Extinção

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

9.plot: The professor is surprised by a Blue Arara in the kitchen. Later, a Bengal Tiger roars at the basement. Then Claudinha asks for his uncle to remove a huge panda bear from his room.

10.title: O Avião

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

10.plot: While the professor flies with the 14 Bis, Santos Dumont and the Wright Brothers are having a cup of tea with Claudinha and Junior in the backyard.

11.title: O Mundo Abissal (parte 1)

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

11.plot: Leslie is outside playing with the professor's hat when a giant squid emerges from the fountain and steal the hat. So Professor Ambrosius and Leslie will join forces on an epic journey through the ocean.

12.title: O Mundo Abissal (parte 2)

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

12.plot: Still searching for the hat, our heroes must face the most dark and deep part of the ocean, the abyssal zone, a dark portion of the sea where sinister creatures lives.

13.title: O Lugar mais Alto do Mundo

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

13.plot: The nephews, professor and Leslie are inside an out of control balloon flying over the mountains. Later we will discover how they ended up there. A balloon trip to the Himalayas becomes a big confusion.

14.title: O Mistério dos Quadros Roubados

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

14.plot: The paintings of the Professor Ambrosius's mansion were stolen and Monalisa is the only witness able to help Sherlock Holmes to solve the mystery.

15.title: Eureka!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

15.plot: An unexpected visit at the mansion: Archimedes. He comes to the mansion to explain about the hydro-static and static principles, but confusion takes place at the Mansion and King Heron himself needs to interfere.

16.title: Grandes Navegações

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

16.plot: A big ship is docked inside the mansion's fountain. Junior and Claudinha decide to play pirates with Leslie inside the vessel, but they don't realize the big surprise that is waiting for them.

17.title: O Grande Prêmio Copérnico

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

17.plot: A very crazy space race is about to begin. The pilots will have to pass through some planets of the solar system to win the "Copernicus" Trophy. Who's gonna be the winner?

18.title: O Monstro do Lago Ness

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

18.plot: The Professor Ambrosius tells Leslie a famous tale about the Loch Ness monster that lives in the Highlands. In the story some of the highlanders get into trouble when they try to discover if the monster really exists, or not.

19.title: Bandeiras do Mundo

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

19.plot: In a talent show hosted by the Professor, the players have to give the correct answers about the flags of the world in all six continents. If they win, tons of chocolate coins will be waiting for them.

20.title: Isso é Hamlet!!!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

20.plot: While Junior is rehearsing for a famous play from Shakespeare called Hamlet, a mysterious ghost appears at the mansion haunting everyone.

21.title: Uma Noite no Campo

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

21.plot: The Professor and Junior decide to go to the countryside, and along the way strange things start to happen while they distance themselves from the city.

22.title: Medusa

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

22.plot: Professor Ambrosius is very excited about a beautiful woman he met at the internet and decides to go on a date with her. What he doesn't know is that his "girl" is, in fact, a mythological Greek creature.

23.title: O Ovo Gigante

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

23.plot: Claudinha's dog named Boris finds a huge egg and brings it inside the Mansion. When they find out that the egg belongs to a dinosaur - it is too late. The mother is outside, furious, and wants her egg back.

24.title: Cavaleiros e Dragões

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

24.plot: While having fun playing a board game, Claudinha, Junior and Ambrosius are transported to a place that they will live a great adventure with castles, princess, knights and dragons. Who will be brave enough to save the princess?

25.title: De Novo Não!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

25.plot: By accident, Professor and Leslie get back in time to ancient Egypt, where they meet Cleopatra.

26.title: Procurando Floribela

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

26.plot: Leslie finds ancient masks from African tribes at the mansion's basement. While the professor looks into them carefully, he meets an important man from one of these tribes.

27.title: O Médico e o Monstro

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

27.plot: It's reading day on the Mansion's library. Claudinha, Junior and Leslie are waiting to hear Robert Louis Stevenson's "Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde". Even Floriblea shows up to hear this famous story. But it looks like Professor is not well.

28.title: Leonardo da Vinci

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

28.plot: We have a big day ahead, as everybody is awaiting a famous guest. The door opens and the great Leonardo da Vinci is there. With so much to catch up with, like paintings, architecture and science, will there be enough time for other stuff?

29.title: A Lenda do Cavaleiro sem Cabeça

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

29.plot: It's Halloween. Junior and Leslie are dressed up and ready to go trick or treating. But before that, Professor decides to tell them a little about how and where this famous festive started.

30.title: A Magia do Cinema

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

30.plot: Weekend has arrived and Claudinha and Junior go to the Mansion for a film session with popcorn included. Soon the Professor takes the opportunity to tell them a little bit about the most popular art nowadays: the Cinema.

31.title: Era Uma Vez...

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

31.plot: Ambrosius and his nephew and niece go for a picnic at the Mansion's garden. There they find fantastic creatures from fairy tales. Soon they find out that all these creatures are playing with their own creators, the Grimm brothers.

32.title: Aventuras na Amazônia

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

32.plot: Claudinha and Junior invite the Professor for a short trip to the Amazônia. He accepts the invitation right away, and traveling through the great rivers, they see beautiful animals and all sort of plants.

33.title: O Mito dos Dragões

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

33.plot: From east to west, from north to south, everyone has heard of the powerful and giant creatures that spit fire and fly up on the skies causing fear and being respected for everyone. We are talking about the myth of the great dragons.

34.title: Corra, Leslie, corra!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

34.plot: It's coffee time. But where does the fruit that makes this curious drink come from? What about its early plantations?

35.title: A Pedra Filosofal

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

35.plot: Professor decides to work restlessly like the alchemists of yore to find out about the secrets of the Philosopher's Stone. When he finally manages to create it, Billy the Pirate shows up and take it away from Professor's hands.

36.title: O Príncipe dos Ladrões

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

36.plot: A pleasant musical sound comes from the Mansion's garden. Under Floribela's suspicious look, Professor goes down the stairs with a candle to check it out. He gets closer, very gently, and is surprised by a big party on the Mansion's garden. The famous legend hero, Robin Hood and his friends are partying around a fire pit on the Mansion's garden.

37.title: Ninjas e Samurais

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

37.plot: It's evening and it's pouring rain. In the kitchen, Professor notes that a samurai tries with difficulty to light up a fire and get warm.

38.title: Senhores do Deserto

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

38.plot: Professor is testing his brand new device to track metal, meanwhile a big sand storm vanishes the whole Mansion. Lucky Professor is helped by a Tuareg that teaches him how to survive in such warm and dry weather such as deserts'.

39.title: O Homem na Lua

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

39.plot: Professor decides to go along with Leslie to a fantastic trip to the Moon, following the steps of the Great Neil Armstrong.

40.title: Invasão Viking

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

40.plot: On a lovely picnic day on the Mansion's garden the ground start shaking and screams are heard all around. To everyone's surprise, the Vikings enter the Mansion's garden with their famous "drakkars".

41.title: O Labirinto do Minotauro

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

41.plot: Leslie has "stolen" a hidden cake and the Professor is mad after him. While trying to hide, Leslie finds Junior, his partner. Junio finds out a stair that leads to a labyrinth.

42.title: O Velho Oeste

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

42.plot: There's something weird in the air. Junior is playing with his water gun, pretending he's a villain from the Old West. Meanwhile, the wind blows a hay ball and change its direction.

43.title: Tudo Acaba em Pizza

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

43.plot: It's pizza day in the Mansion and everybody is invited. Professor decides to make the pizza from scratch, from dough to baking it.

44.title: Um Passeio para Atletas

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

44.plot: It's exercising day on Mansion. While a tiring aerobics session is made, the gang has an unexpected visit.

45.title: Invenções Chinesas

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

45.plot: Mr. Tung is back to the Mansion, and this time he brings dinner over. To Leslie and Junior's misery, they're starving, but can't eat with Chinese chopsticks.

46.title: Maravilhas do Mundo Antigo

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

46.plot: Professor and the kids are playing a table game with the famous explorer Robert Brentwood, all of a sudden something unexpected happens: the dice shine and absorb the players to a faraway past.

47.title: Entrando Numa Fria

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

47.plot: Professor wins on a lottery a trip to Alaska and decides to go on holidays along with Leslie. Floribela stays minding the Mansion.

48.title: Quem tem Medo de Zumbis?

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

48.plot: Junior and Leslie convince Claudinha to make a zombie movie. While Junior explains to Claudinha about this popular folklore, some weird things start to happen. The Mansion is invaded by zombies to everyone's despair.

49.title: Um Safari na África

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

49.plot: Professor is visited by an African friend from Kenya and invited on a trip. Now he'll visit one of the richest ecological parks in the world.

50.title: Chove Chuva!

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

50.plot: It's pouring rain. Claudinha and Junior spent nearly the whole weekend indoors waiting for the rain to stop, but it looks like it won't stop any time soon.

51.title: Um Estranho no Ninho

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

51.plot: It's another nice day for a picnic on the Mansion's garden. After choosing under which tree they'll sit down, Professor and the kids start a conversation about how important trees are for life on planet Earth.

52.title: O Calcanhar de Aquiles

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

52.plot: While the kids play and go through lots of super heroes, Junior plays the famous Achilles, known by being invincible.

53.title: Os Mistérios da Área 51

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

53.plot: Professor Ambrosio wakes up in the middle of the night and realizes that there are some invaders around. They have stolen the magic cube from the Mansion and this cube opens dimensional portals.

54.title: As Minas do Rei Salomão

episode of.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio (TV Series 2010–2016)

54.plot: In another adventure, Professor will have the one and only opportunity to meet the great King Solomon, the wisest king on Earth. And in order to protect the Holy Grail and the Ark of the Testimony.

imdb.title: A Mansão Maluca do Professor Ambrósio
plot: Meet great names of History, learn about incredible inventions and fantastic legends and have fun in unusual situations.::Tortuga Studios
